text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Private corporation" means a Maryland corporation organized to establish, operate, and maintain a foreign trade zone under the federal Foreign Trade Zones Act.
"Private corporation" does not include a public corporation.

text.section:
"Public corporation" means:
the State;
a subdivision of the State; or
an incorporated public authority, commission, agency, or other corporate instrumentality of:
the State;
a subdivision or municipal corporation of the State; or
the State and another state.
